name: listening-stats
description: Real-time listening statistics dashboard for Spotify

scripts.build: npm run build:ext && npm run build:app && cp manifest.json dist/
scripts.watch: npm run build:ext -- --watch & npm run build:app -- --watch
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:files && spicetify config custom_apps listening-stats && spicetify apply
scripts.deploy:files: mkdir -p ~/.config/spicetify/CustomApps/listening-stats && cp dist/index.js ~/.config/spicetify/CustomApps/listening-stats/ && cp dist/listening-stats.js ~/.config/spicetify/CustomApps/listening-stats/ && cp manifest.json ~/.config/spicetify/CustomApps/listening-stats/
scripts.undeploy: spicetify config custom_apps listening-stats- && rm -rf ~/.config/spicetify/CustomApps/listening-stats && spicetify apply

author: Xndr2
